name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
schedule:
1.　　Properties of materials
2.　　Nature of metals and alloys
3.　　Equilibrium phase diagrams & the Fe-C systems
4.　　Heat treatment
5.　　Measurement & inspection & testing
6.　　Fundamentals of casting
7.　　Mold casting processes
8.　　Fundamentals of metal forming
9.　　Midterm Exam
10.　　Bulk forming processes
11.　　Powder metallurgy
12.　　Fundamentals of machining
13.　　Cutting tools, turning, drilling, & milling
14.　　Numerical control
15.　　Abrasive machining
16.　　Fundamentals of joining
17.　　Surface engineering
18.　　Final Exam
materials:
Textbook: 　　Materials & Processes in Manufacturing, J. T. Black & R. A. Kohser, 11th-ed, Wiley, 2013.
Reference:   Principles of Modern Manufacturing, M. P. Groover, Wiley, 2011.
                   Manufacturing Engineering and Technology, S. Kalpakjian & S. R. Schmid, Pearson, 2014.
